title: SolveCircle
description:
❌ The Problem:
Many employees do the bare minimum because traditional task management tools focus only on tracking—not engagement. 
✅ The SolveCircle Approach:
We bring game mechanics into workplace productivity, making task completion more engaging through:
🎯 Challenges & Rewards – Employees earn points & recognition for completing tasks
📊 Clear Progress Tracking – No more confusion over what needs to be done
🏆 Incentives for Performance – Encourage participation with leaderboards & perks
